name: Korres Showergel 250ml
description: Showergel by Korres. Featuring a rich cream-foam formula enriched with active aloe Â®, vitamin C and E, the shower gels moisturise the skin while antioxidants help to enhance the immune system. brand.name: Korres
brand.description: Since their origins, organic brand Korres have always been a kind bunch, using only skin- and environmentally-friendly ingredients. Thanks to their pharmacy roots, all their essential fruit oils and herbal infusions are locally sourced and kept free of any nasty synthetics. The result is a range of all natural skincare, bodycare and suncare that smells as good as it is.
